releaseNotes:
Noty v2.0 - UI Enhancement Update

• Task Completion: Added ability to mark tasks complete directly from the main tab
• Improved Visual Feedback: Added strikethrough text styling for completed tasks
• Enhanced UI Responsiveness: Immediate visual feedback when completing tasks
• Performance Improvements: Optimized task list rendering and updates
• Android 12+ Support: Continued compatibility improvements for newer Android versions
• Bug Fixes: Various minor fixes and stability improvements
